welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tifton, a charming city known for its southern hospitality and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and have a wonderful time exploring all that Tifton has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Henry Tift Myers Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Henry Tift Myers Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spence Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Spence Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
